aws_cur_report_definition.description: Provides a Cost and Usage Report Definition.

report_name.description: Unique name for the report. Must start with a number/letter and is case sensitive. Limited to 256 characters.

time_unit.description: The frequency on which report data are measured and displayed.  Valid values are: HOURLY, DAILY.

format.description: Format for report. Valid values are: textORcsv.

compression.description: Compression format for report. Valid values are: GZIP, ZIP.

additional_schema_elements.description: A list of schema elements. Valid values are: RESOURCES.

s3_bucket.description: Name of the existing S3 bucket to hold generated reports.

s3_prefix.description: Report path prefix. Limited to 256 characters.

s3_region.description: Region of the existing S3 bucket to hold generated reports.

additional_artifacts.description: A list of additional artifacts. Valid values are: REDSHIFT, QUICKSIGHT.
